title: Pizza.Connection.3.Calzone.MULTi9.Update.v1.0.6731.25871-PLAZA
description:
DOWNLOAD THE LASEST PC GAMES AND UPDATES AT: GoodOldDownloads.com

PLAZA PRESENTS
Pizza Connection 3 Calzone MULTi9 Update v1.0.6731.25871
(c) Assemble Entertainment
Release Date :  06/2018                     Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                           Genre      : Simulation
For list of changes read included patchnotes.txt
1. Extract release
2. Run setup.exe
3. Install update
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!
This patch requires:
Pizza.Connection.3.Calzone.MULTi9-PLAZA
General Notes:
- Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online ..
- If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
